topic.title: 친구를 저녁 식사에 초대하기
topic.description: 친구를 집으로 저녁 식사에 초대하고 약속을 잡는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 안녕, 민준. 이번 주 금요일 저녁에 시간 있어?
우리 집에 와서 같이 저녁 식사하는 거 어때?
정말? 너무 좋다! 몇 시에 가면 될까?
저녁 7시쯤 어때? 내가 맛있는 파스타 만들어 줄게.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hey, Minjun. Are you free this Friday evening?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hey, Minjun. | Are you free | this Friday evening?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How about coming over to my place and we **have dinner together**?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How about coming over | to my place || and we have dinner together?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Really? That sounds great! What time should I be there?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Really? | That sounds great! || What time | should I be there?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How about around 7 PM? I'll make some delicious pasta for you.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How about | around 7 PM? || I'll make some delicious pasta | for you.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Perfect! See you on Friday then.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Perfect! || See you on Friday then.
